title: Why Doesn't My Boyfriend Want To Have Sex With Me? – Love & Sex Stuff
description:
Submit your questions here!:
http://www.kindafunny.com/loveandsex

As always, communication is key.

Each and every Monday at 9AM PST Tim Gettys and Nick Scarpino answer your questions about dating and relationship advice....cause that sounds like a good idea.


Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino



Music by Tonedeff - http://www.QN5.com

transcript_chunks.text: you want to go swimming I don't like swimming as much as you do Nick but that's okay it's not [Music] okay today's question comes from our friend Jessica Jessica she's 23 and she says hi guys my boyfriend and I have been together for 2 years our relationship has only one hiccup Justin is very rarely interested in having sex with me we have sex once or twice a week but it's primarily because I initiate and he goes along with it I try to initiate almost every other day and most times he no thank you I'm really tired and the occasional Jess let's not ruin a good thing arguing I consider myself a pretty confident person but hearing these things as often as I do has left me sad frustrated and self-conscious I can admit I think I have a fairly high sex drive but I also feel Justin is unusually low he has assured me he's very attracted to me and I still feel very loved just not wanted do you guys have any tips for talking about such a sensitive subject so it doesn't turn into a fight you've

low he has assured me he's very attracted to me and I still feel very loved just not wanted do you guys have any tips for talking about such a sensitive subject so it doesn't turn into a fight you've got to just talk about it Jess um it's one of those things where this is this is a major thing in your relationship and I'm not saying it's a bad thing I'm just saying if you want it more than he does uh you owe it to yourself to at least try to figure out how to get it m uh now what's funny is when she first started this out I was like is she dating my wife no that that that's one of those things where I've been in you know a couple relationships and I most of the time I've been lucky enough that we have matched in terms of sex drive like my current relationship it's totally like equal match and I I love that it's like wow we really hit this equilibrium where I'm happy but one of my previous relationships she wanted it way more than I did and I remember feeling like super like oh [ __ ]

and I I love that it's like wow we really hit this equilibrium where I'm happy but one of my previous relationships she wanted it way more than I did and I remember feeling like super like oh [ __ ] like I this I feel like I'm doing it's overwhelming have to do things I don't want to do and then another relationship I had I wanted it way more than she wanted it I've never been in a relationship where it's been one to one where we've wanted it exactly the same obviously I always want it more what's up but what I've recently realized is it's not necessarily about the volume for me it's more about like when we do connect on that level making it the best possible experience right and just knowing that no matter what if you're if you're dating another human being you're going to be fundamentally different on on some level you might not align in that regard um so you do just need to talk about it you have to keep talking about it and guys especially guys that are 23 we're like walls right

different on on some level you might not align in that regard um so you do just need to talk about it you have to keep talking about it and guys especially guys that are 23 we're like walls right where we just don't want to deal with real life yet um and to be perfectly honest we never really do so as a woman part of what you sort of have to do in the relationship unfortunately is make us grow up a little bit and deal with these real mature issues and this is a real issue I think it's it does get a little complicated though because you know a big thing that she said is He's Just Not That Into sex like and he sex isn't that important to him or whatever and that's very valid and that's something that he's allowed to be that way and it is the compromise and it is the the thing of you guys want something different you know and what sucks is the fact that it's affecting her in that way where she's feeling not wanted and that's that's hard because he needs to make her feel wanted because
